message.content: {"given_definition_quality":65,"better_definition":"in the process of (doing something)","sentence":"我正在学习。","image_prompt":"soft apocalypse animation style, a young person sitting at a simple desk with a book open, concentrating and writing, with subtle hints of the world outside changing softly (like faded city and gentle, surreal alterations to the surroundings), symbolizing being in the process of studying. Warm colors, softly animated details, a calm but slightly dreamlike atmosphere.","sentence_translation":"I am studying."}
